/2020/06/05/world/coronavirus-updates.html,"U.S. Cases Are Still Rising by More Than 20,000 DailyThe uptick, mainly in the South and West, appears to be driven in part by increased testing and the virus taking hold in new regions. Here’s the latest.",,20200606-0000

/2020/06/05/nyregion/police-kettling-protests-nyc.html,"This Police Tactic Turns Peaceful New York Protests Into ChaosOfficers have encircled protesters breaking curfew so they cannot exit public spaces like parks or city blocks, and then charged them with seemingly little provocation.",,20200606-0000

/2020/06/05/us/buffalo-police-shove-protester-unrest.html,Buffalo Police Officers Suspended After Shoving 75-Year-Old ProtesterFifty-seven officers resigned from their team in support of the two who were suspended. The protester was in serious but stable condition.,,20200606-0000
